text:
From time to time, we may share your information with the following third parties and to the extent possible, we encourage you to review their privacy policies and terms of use to see how they treat the information we share with them: Zendesk ( ZenDesk Privacy Policy ) ; Google ( Google Privacy Policy ); Atlas ( Atlas Privacy Policy ); Zoom ( Zoom Privacy Policy ); Amazon ( Amazon Privacy Policy ).
We may share your information with third parties who assist with delivery of our products and services.

From time to time, we may share your information with the following third parties and to the extent possible, we encourage you to review their privacy policies and terms of use to see how they treat the information we share with them: Zendesk ( ZenDesk Privacy Policy ) ; Google ( Google Privacy Policy ); Atlas ( Atlas Privacy Policy ); Zoom ( Zoom Privacy Policy ); Amazon ( Amazon Privacy Policy ).
We may share your information with third parties who assist with delivery of our products and services.
We use cookies to tell us how often you visit our site, and what pages you go to on our site.
Sometimes we use files from other companies (called third-party cookies) to help us see where people go on our website.
Our goal is to provide you with a unique and secure experience when using Torsh TALENT and as such we do need some personal information to make that happen.
